law.catch_line: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated....

section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Prince George's County Board of License Commissioners.
"Festival" means the Prince George's County Wine Festival.
Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, this section applies only in Prince George's County.
This section does not apply in the 24th Legislative District.

text.section: The Board may issue one wine festival license each year.

Notwithstanding any other provision of this article, an applicant for a wine festival license shall be a holder of a retail alcoholic beverages license, a Class 3 winery license, or a Class 4 limited winery license.

section.section: Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, a holder of a wine festival license may display and sell wine at the Festival for consumption on or off the premises on the days and for the hours designated for the Festival.

The wine shall be:
Manufactured and processed in any state;
Price filed in accordance with regulations that the Comptroller adopts; and
Distributed in the State by the time the application for the wine festival license is filed.

text.section: This section does not prohibit the holder of a wine festival license from holding another alcoholic beverages license of a different class or nature.

section.section:
Products displayed and sold shall be:
Invoiced to the holder of the wine festival license by a licensed State wholesaler, winery, or limited winery; and
Delivered to the Festival from the licensed premises of the wholesaler, winery, or limited winery.

Whenever a wine festival license is issued under this section, holders of wholesale, winery, or limited winery licenses may enter into an agreement with the holder of a wine festival license to deliver wine 2 days before the effective date, and to accept returns 2 days after the expiration date of the wine festival license.

text.section: The Board shall adopt regulations to carry out this section.
